required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on the Tolerability, Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics of GST-HG141 Tablets
clinical_study.official_title: To Evaluate the Tolerability, Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics of GST-HG141 Tablets in Multiple-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Multiple-dose, Multiple-administration Study in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B

brief_summary.textblock: To Evaluate the Tolerability, Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics of GST-HG141 Tablets in Multiple-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Multiple-dose, Multiple-administration Study in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B (CHB)

detailed_description.textblock: This study includes 3 cohorts of 25 mg BID, 50 mg BID and 100 mg BID. 30 patients with chronic hepatitis B will be enrolled in this study and each cohort will enroll 10 patients (GST-HG141 tablets : PBO=8:2). All enrolled patients will be given research drugs twice a day for 28 days (D28 was administered only once in the morning). And each cohort requires at least 4 subjects with elevated ALT. Tolerability, pharmacodynamics and pharmacokinetics will be evaluated according to the protocol.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with chronic HBV infection with treatment-related adverse events and laboratory abnormalities.
primary_outcome.description: Symptoms and physical examination, clinical laboratory examination, vital signs，12 lead ECG and adrenal ultrasounds were collected and assessed by CTCAE v5.0.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on -0.5, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12hours on Day1; -0.5 hours on Day 8, Day 15, Day22 and Day 27 for trough concentration; -0.5, 0.5 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours on Day 28.
primary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacokinetic analysis

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on -0.5, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12hours on Day1; -0.5 hours on Day 8, Day 15, Day22 and Day 27 for trough concentration; -0.5, 0.5 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours on Day 28.
primary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacokinetic analysis

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on -0.5, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12hours on Day1; -0.5 hours on Day 8, Day 15, Day22 and Day 27 for trough concentration; -0.5, 0.5 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours on Day 28.
primary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacokinetic analysis

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on -0.5, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12hours on Day1; -0.5 hours on Day 8, Day 15, Day22 and Day 27 for trough concentration; -0.5, 0.5 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours on Day 28.
primary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacokinetic analysis

secondary_outcome.measure: The value of serum HBV DNA decreased from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Plasma samples were collected before administation on the morning of day 1 and day 15 and at any time on day 29 and day 33
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacodynamics analysis

secondary_outcome.measure: The value of serum HBV pgRNA decreased from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Plasma samples were collected before administation on the morning of day 1 and day 15 and at any time on day 29 and day 33
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacodynamics analysis

secondary_outcome.measure: The value of serum HBsAg decreased from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Plasma samples were collected before administation on the morning of day 1 and day 15 and at any time on day 29 and day 33
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacodynamics analysis

secondary_outcome.measure: The value of serum HBeAg decreased from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Plasma samples were collected before administation on the morning of day 1 and day 15 and at any time on day 29 and day 33
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were collected at different points for pharmacodynamics analysis

arm_group.description: GST-HG141 tablets at varying dosages by mouth for 28 days
Placebos for GST-HG141 tablets at varying dosages by mouth for 28 days

intervention.description: Administrate GST-HG141 tablets orally in fed state twice daily at 25 mg or 50mg or 100 mg doses
Administrate the placebos for GST-HG141 tablets orally in fed state twice daily at 25 mg or 50mg or 100 mg doses

overall_official.affiliation: The First Hospital of Jilin University
